header.div: Complete the sentences with an appropriate article or possessive adjective.

ol.li: I am writing to congratulate you on excellent coverage of the cricket yesterday.
Your foreign correspondent Stephen Pennington is an exceptional journalist. I would very much like to see more of informative articles in your newspaper.
It is years since I last read such insightful article on this subject.
It was with great sadness that I watched last of your fascinating documentaries last night.
I would like to congratulate you on the high standard of your journalists. professionalism and dedication is a credit to your newspaper.
I have never written letter to a newspaper before but feel I have to write to congratulate you on yesterday's excellent editorial.
My family and I depend on your channel for evening entertainment.
I would like to know if Matt Drew, hilarious disc jockey who presented the breakfast show last week, will be given a programme of his own in the near future.
Congratulations on your recent documentary series. I thoroughly enjoyed it and did not miss single episode.
Anna Elbourn is a wonderful interviewer. I have thoroughly enjoyed all of talk shows and am very much looking forward to next season's series.
I am writing to thank you for invaluable financial advice you published in last month's edition of your magazine.
I particularly enjoyed the article on Internet shopping and would like to know if you are planning to introduce regular column on e-business.
I would like to express heartfelt gratitude to everyone at your newspaper for the hard work they have put into the campaign to raise money for our local hospital.
I am writing in response to article about animal rights in today's edition of your newspaper, which, I have to say, is one of the most powerful pieces of journalism I have ever read.

section.p: An article or possessive adjective is needed in each of the sentences.
